title: Fifa 20 player ratings finally appear on EA Sports website after long wait
text:
The Fifa 20 player ratings have finally been revealed – almost exactly an hour after they were supposed to arrive.

Developers EA Sports had promised that the full rankings would arrive at 3pm UK time.

But despite a flurry of tweets from different accounts, linking out to the official website, nothing actually appeared there. All of the players who were supposed to have rankings continued to have question marks next to them, and the page didn't load properly.

We’ll tell you what’s true. You can form your own view. From 15p €0.18 $0.18 USD 0.27 a day, more exclusives, analysis and extras.

It led to huge frustration among players who had been teased by Fifa about the release and were left unable to see the ratings.

Now they have finally appeared, letting players see the top 100 players in the game – and exactly how they are rated on each measure.

Shape Created with Sketch. Top 10 players in Fifa 20 Show all 10 left Created with Sketch. right Created with Sketch. Shape Created with Sketch. Top 10 players in Fifa 20 1/10 Lionel Messi With a rating of 94, the Barcelona legend beat Cristiano Ronaldo to the top spot Getty 2/10 Cristiano Ronaldo Is 34-year-old Ronaldo past his peak? With a Fifa 20 score of 93, he narrowly missed out to his Argentine rival Reuters 3/10 Neymar Brazilian Neymar has a Fifa 20 rating of 92 AFP/Getty Images 4/10 Eden Hazard Hazard, who joined Real Madrid from Chelsea this summer, scored 91 in Fifa 20 Getty 5/10 Kevin de Bruyne Fellow Belgian has the same 91 rating as Hazard Getty Images 6/10 Jan Oblak Slovenian Jan Oblak is the highest-rated goalkeeper in Fifa 20, with a rating of 91 EPA 7/10 Virgil Van Dijk Van Dijk became the first defender to win the Uefa Player of the Year Award. He has a rating of 90 in Fifa 20 Liverpool FC via Getty Images 8/10 Mohamed Salah Salah is the second Liverpool player in the top 10, with a score of 90 Liverpool FC via Getty Images 9/10 Luka Modric Modric won the Best FIFA Men's Player in 2018 and has a 90 rating in Fifa 20 REUTERS 10/10 Marc-Andre ter Stegen The German keeper plays for FC Barcelona and has a 90 rating in Fifa 20 AFP/Getty Images 1/10 Lionel Messi With a rating of 94, the Barcelona legend beat Cristiano Ronaldo to the top spot Getty 2/10 Cristiano Ronaldo Is 34-year-old Ronaldo past his peak? He has a rating of 90 in Fifa 20 Liverpool FC via Getty Images 8/10 Mohamed Salah Salah is the second Liverpool player in the top 10, with a score of 90 Liverpool FC via Getty Images 9/10 Luka Modric Modric won the Best FIFA Men's Player in 2018 and has a 90 rating in Fifa 20 REUTERS 10/10 Marc-Andre ter Stegen The German keeper plays for FC Barcelona and has a 90 rating in Fifa 20 AFP/Getty Images

The full list can be found on EA Sports' website.
description: The Fifa 20 player ratings have finally been revealed – almost exactly an hour after they were supposed to arrive. Developers EA Sports had promised that the full rankings would arrive at 3pm UK time.
